Translations.Text: DEUS proclaimed NON worship 2 DEUS ibi est UNUS UNUS DEUS! Vos reverence Me alone
Eum belongs everything caelum terra ergo religionis devoted absolutely Eum alone Vos worship DEUS
Any beatus vos enjoy est DEUS. autem whenever vos incur any adversity vos statim complain Eum
prout soon prout He relieves tuus affliction some de vos revert idol worship
Let them disbelieve quod nos dedit them! Iit ahead enjoy ex; temporanea; vos perfecit surely invenit out
They designate idols they set ignorance share provisions nos bestow them. De DEUS vos habuit accountable pro tuus innovations
They et assign filia DEUS He glorified dum they prefer themselves quod they like
When unus de them gets baby puella his face becomes darkened overwhelming grief
Ashamed he hides people malus news dedit eum. He et ponders should he keep baby grudgingly bury eam in dust Miserable indeed est their judgment
Those non believe in Hereafter set malus examples dum to DEUS belongs the multus sublime examples! He est Almighty the Multus Wise

Si DEUS punished people their transgressions He annihilated omnis creature terra. He respites them pro specific predetermined temporis Dodum their interim finis they non delay it 1 hora nor advance it
They ascribe to DEUS quod they dislike themselves tunc utter lie their suus tongues they est righteous! Sine any doubt they incurred Hell they rebelled
De DEUS nos sent (messengers) communities vos devil adorned their works their eyes Consequently he est nunc their dominus they incurred painful retribution
Nos revealed hoc scripture vos point them quod they dispute provisus guidance mercy people qui believe
DEUS sends CAELUM AQUA revive TERRA it ABIIT! Hoc est (sufficient) proof people hear
in livestock ibi est lesson vos nos provisus vos drink their bellies Ex midst de digested food blood vos get pure milk delicious pro drinkers
Ac fruits de datum palms grapes vos produce intoxicants alias prout bonus provisions Hoc est (sufficient) proof people understand
Tuus Dominus inspired bee build domus montis trees hives they build vos
Tunc eat totus fruits posterus design tuus Dominus precisely Ex their bellies advenit drink different colors wherein ibi healing people Hoc est (sufficient) proof people reflect
DEUS created VOS TUNC He terminates TUUS VITA. He lets some de vos vivens veteris saeculum, unus invenit out ut ibi est limit to knowledge they acquire. DEUS est Omniscient Omnipotent
DEUS HABET provisus pro some de VOS multus than others! Those dedit satis nunquam dedit their properties their subordinates extent factus them partners they Would dedit up deus blessings
Deus factus vos conjux yourselves ac produced vos ex tuus conjux infans grandchildren provisus vos bonus provisions they believe in falsehood turn unappreciative de deus blessings
they worship DEUS quod non possesses provisions pro them caelum nor on terra nor provisus them anything
Ergo non cite examples DEUS; DEUS knows dum vos non know
